titles.title: District of Columbia College Access Improvement Act of 2002
Providing for the concurrence of the House with amendment in the Senate amendments to the bill H.R. 1499.

action.text: Mrs. Morella moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 364.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/12/2002--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 1499 (District of Columbia college access improvements).
